=nâ€‹(N+nâˆ’1)N2â€‹âˆ‘j=1Nâ€–Ï•jtâ€–22+nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)N2â€‹âˆ‘i,jâˆˆ[N],iâ‰ jâŸ¨Ï•it,Ï•jtâŸ©,absentğ‘›ğ‘ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡22ğ‘›ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2subscriptformulae-sequenceğ‘–ğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘—superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\frac{n(N+n-1)}{N^{2}}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\|\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{n(n-1)}{N^{2}}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}i,j\in[N],i\neq j\end{subarray}}\langle\bm{\phi}_{i}^{t},\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\rangle, (22)

where (a)ğ‘(a) and (b)ğ‘(b) hold because j1,â€¦,jnsubscriptğ‘—1â€¦subscriptğ‘—ğ‘›j_{1},\dots,j_{n} are independent and uniformly distributed over [N]delimited-[]ğ‘[N], respectively. For any integers i,jâˆˆItğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡i,j\in{I}_{t} such that iâ‰ jğ‘–ğ‘—i\neq j and k,â„“âˆˆ[0,Kâˆ’1]ğ‘˜â„“0ğ¾1k,\ell\in[0,K-1], we have ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k,ğ’ˆjt,â„“âˆ’ğ‘®jt,â„“âŸ©=ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k,ğ”¼ğƒit,â„“â€‹[ğ’ˆjt,â„“âˆ’ğ‘®jt,â„“]âŸ©=0,ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜subscriptğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğƒğ‘–ğ‘¡â„“delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“0\mathbb{E}{}\left\langle{}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}{}-{}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}{},\bm{g}_{j}^{t,\ell}{}-{}\bm{G}_{j}^{t,\ell}\right\rangle{}={}\mathbb{E}{}\left\langle{}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}{}-{}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}{},\mathbb{E}_{\bm{\xi}_{i}^{t,\ell}}{}\left[\bm{g}_{j}^{t,\ell}{}-{}\bm{G}_{j}^{t,\ell}\right]\right\rangle{}={}0, where the first equality uses Fact 1 and the second equality follows from Assumption 2. Therefore,

ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨Ï•it,Ï•jtâŸ©=âˆ‘0â‰¤k,â„“â‰¤Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k,ğ’ˆjt,â„“âˆ’ğ‘®jt,â„“âŸ©=0,ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡subscriptformulae-sequence0ğ‘˜â„“ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“0\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\langle\bm{\phi}_{i}^{t},\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\right\rangle=\sum_{0\leq k,\ell\leq K-1}\mathbb{E}\left\langle\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k},\bm{g}_{j}^{t,\ell}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,\ell}\right\rangle=0, (23)

which implies that

ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘i,jâˆˆ[N],iâ‰ jâŸ¨Ï•it,Ï•jtâŸ©]=âˆ‘i,jâˆˆ[N],iâ‰ jğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨Ï•it,Ï•jtâŸ©=0.ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptformulae-sequenceğ‘–ğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘—superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡subscriptformulae-sequenceğ‘–ğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘—ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡0\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}i,j\in[N],i\neq j\end{subarray}}\langle\bm{\phi}_{i}^{t},\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\rangle\right]=\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}i,j\in[N],i\neq j\end{subarray}}\mathbb{E}\left\langle\bm{\phi}_{i}^{t},\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\right\rangle=0.

It then follows from the law of total expectation and (22) that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„tÏ•jtâ€–22=ğ”¼â€‹[ğ”¼â„tâ€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„tÏ•jtâ€–22]=ğ”¼â€‹[nâ€‹(N+nâˆ’1)N2â€‹âˆ‘j=1Nâ€–Ï•jtâ€–22].ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡22ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptğ”¼subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡22ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ‘ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\right\|_{2}^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}_{\mathcal{I}_{t}}\left\|\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\right\|_{2}^{2}\right]=\mathbb{E}\left[\frac{n(N+n-1)}{N^{2}}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\|\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}\right]. (24)

To proceed, we note that for any integers k,â„“âˆˆ[0,Kâˆ’1]ğ‘˜â„“0ğ¾1k,\ell\in[0,K-1] such that k<â„“ğ‘˜â„“k<\ell, it follows from Fact 1 and Assumption 2 that ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,k,ğ’ˆjt,â„“âˆ’ğ‘®jt,â„“âŸ©=ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,k,ğ”¼ğƒit,â„“â€‹[ğ’ˆjt,â„“âˆ’ğ‘®jt,â„“]âŸ©=0.ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜subscriptğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğƒğ‘–ğ‘¡â„“delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡â„“0\mathbb{E}\left\langle\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k},\bm{g}_{j}^{t,\ell}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,\ell}\right\rangle=\mathbb{E}\left\langle\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k},\mathbb{E}_{\bm{\xi}_{i}^{t,\ell}}\left[\bm{g}_{j}^{t,\ell}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,\ell}\right]\right\rangle=0. This implies that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–Ï•jtâ€–22=ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,k)â€–22=âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,kâ€–22.ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}=\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (25)

Substituting (25) into (24) yields

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„tÏ•jtâ€–22=nâ€‹(N+nâˆ’1)N2â€‹âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,kâ€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘¡22ğ‘›ğ‘ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{t}\right\|_{2}^{2}=\frac{n(N+n-1)}{N^{2}}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k}\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(a)nâ€‹(N+nâˆ’1)N2â€‹Nâ€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2â‰¤(b)2â€‹nâ€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2,superscriptğ‘absentğ‘›ğ‘ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2ğ‘ğ¾superscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘2ğ‘›ğ¾superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}\frac{n(N+n-1)}{N^{2}}NK\sigma^{2}\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}}2nK\sigma^{2}, (26)

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses Assumption 3 and (b)ğ‘(b) holds because nâ‰¤Nğ‘›ğ‘n\leq N. This completes the proof of (19).

We further note that for any integers s,râˆˆ[Ï„iâ€‹(t),tâˆ’1]ğ‘ ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1s,r\in[\tau_{i}(t),t-1] such that s<rğ‘ ğ‘Ÿs<r, it follows from Fact 1 that

ğ”¼â„râ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„rÏ•jrâŸ©=ğ”¼j1r,â€¦,jnrâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘u=1nÏ•jurrâŸ©subscriptğ”¼subscriptâ„ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘Ÿsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘Ÿâ€¦superscriptsubscriptğ‘—ğ‘›ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘¢1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•superscriptsubscriptğ‘—ğ‘¢ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\mathcal{I}_{r}}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{r}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle=\mathbb{E}_{j_{1}^{r},\dots,j_{n}^{r}}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{u=1}^{n}\bm{\phi}_{j_{u}^{r}}^{r}\right\rangle
=âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘u=1nğ”¼jurâ€‹[Ï•jurr]âŸ©=âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘u=1nâˆ‘j=1N1Nâ€‹Ï•jrâŸ©absentsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘¢1ğ‘›subscriptğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ‘—ğ‘¢ğ‘Ÿdelimited-[]superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•superscriptsubscriptğ‘—ğ‘¢ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘¢1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿ\displaystyle=\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{u=1}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{j_{u}^{r}}[\bm{\phi}_{j_{u}^{r}}^{r}]\right\rangle=\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{u=1}^{n}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\frac{1}{N}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle
=nNâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘j=1NÏ•jrâŸ©.absentğ‘›ğ‘subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿ\displaystyle=\frac{n}{N}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j=1}^{N}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle. (27)

Taking expectation wrt ğƒrâ‰”{ğƒjr,k:jâˆˆ[N],k=0,1,â€¦,Kâˆ’1}â‰”superscriptğƒğ‘Ÿconditional-setsuperscriptsubscriptğƒğ‘—ğ‘Ÿğ‘˜formulae-sequenceğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘ğ‘˜01â€¦ğ¾1\bm{\xi}^{r}\coloneqq\{\bm{\xi}_{j}^{r,k}:j\in[N],k=0,1,\dots,K-1\} in (27) gives

ğ”¼ğƒrâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘j=1NÏ•jrâŸ©subscriptğ”¼superscriptğƒğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\bm{\xi}^{r}}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j=1}^{N}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle
=âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆjs,kâˆ’ğ‘®js,k),âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼ğƒjr,kâ€‹[ğ’ˆjr,kâˆ’ğ‘®jr,k]âŸ©=0,absentsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1subscriptğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğƒğ‘—ğ‘Ÿğ‘˜delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘Ÿğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿğ‘˜0\displaystyle=\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}(\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}),\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}_{\bm{\xi}_{j}^{r,k}}\left[\bm{g}_{j}^{r,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{r,k}\right]\right\rangle=0, (28)

where the second equality uses Fact 1 and the last equality uses Assumption 2. Combining (27) and (28) implies that for any integers s,râˆˆ[Ï„iâ€‹(t),tâˆ’1]ğ‘ ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1s,r\in[\tau_{i}(t),t-1] such that s<rğ‘ ğ‘Ÿs<r, we have

ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„rÏ•jrâŸ©=ğ”¼â€‹[ğ”¼â„râ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„rÏ•jrâŸ©]ğ”¼subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘Ÿsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptğ”¼subscriptâ„ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘Ÿsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{r}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle=\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}_{\mathcal{I}_{r}}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{r}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle\right]
=nNâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘j=1NÏ•jrâŸ©]=nNâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[ğ”¼ğƒrâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘j=1NÏ•jrâŸ©]=0.absentğ‘›ğ‘ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptğ”¼superscriptğƒğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle=\frac{n}{N}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j=1}^{N}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle\right]=\frac{n}{N}\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}_{\bm{\xi}^{r}}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j=1}^{N}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle\right]=0.

It follows that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•jsâ€–22=âˆ‘Ï„iâ€‹(t)â‰¤s,râ‰¤tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•js,âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„rÏ•jrâŸ©ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ 22subscriptformulae-sequencesubscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘ ğ‘Ÿğ‘¡1ğ”¼subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘Ÿsuperscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘Ÿ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s}\right\|_{2}^{2}=\sum_{\tau_{i}(t)\leq s,r\leq t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\langle\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s},\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{r}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{r}\right\rangle
=âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÏ•jsâ€–22â‰¤2â€‹nâ€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Ïƒ2,absentsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptbold-italic-Ï•ğ‘—ğ‘ 222ğ‘›ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bm{\phi}_{j}^{s}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq 2nK{\lambda}\sigma^{2}, (29)

where the inequality follows from (26) and Assumption 4. This completes the proof of (20). âˆ

Lemma 3.

Suppose that Assumptions 2, 3, 4, and 6 hold. Then, it hold for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆnIIDtâ€–22â‰¤4â€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2+2â€‹G2â€‹K2nâ€‹Î·Â¯2+2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡224ğ¾superscriptğœ22superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚22superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}\leq\frac{4K\sigma^{2}+2G^{2}K^{2}}{n}\bar{\eta}^{2}+2\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}.
Proof.

In view of (15), we have

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆnIIDtâ€–22=ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ’ˆit,kâ€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
=ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹(ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k+ğ‘®it,k)â€–22absentğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\left(\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}+\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(a)2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹(ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k)â€–22+2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ‘®it,kâ€–22superscriptğ‘absent2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜222ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}2\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\left(\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}+2\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(b)2â€‹Î·Â¯2n2â€‹2â€‹nâ€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2+2â€‹Î·Â¯2n2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.superscriptğ‘absent2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ‘›22ğ‘›ğ¾superscriptğœ22superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ‘›2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}}\frac{2\bar{\eta}^{2}}{n^{2}}2nK\sigma^{2}+\frac{2\bar{\eta}^{2}}{n^{2}}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (30)

where the (a)ğ‘(a) uses Fact 2 with m=2ğ‘š2m=2, (b)ğ‘(b) follows from Lemma 2. Following similar arguments for showing (21), we can obtain

ğ”¼â„tâ€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22subscriptğ”¼subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\mathcal{I}_{t}}\left\|\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= nNâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâ€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22+nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)N2â€‹âˆ‘i,jâˆˆ[N]âŸ¨âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,k,âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®jt,kâŸ©ğ‘›ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22ğ‘›ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2subscriptğ‘–ğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜\displaystyle\frac{n}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{n(n-1)}{N^{2}}\sum_{i,j\in[N]}\left\langle\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k},\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k}\right\rangle
=\displaystyle= nNâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâ€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22+nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)N2â€‹â€–âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.ğ‘›ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22ğ‘›ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\frac{n}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{n(n-1)}{N^{2}}\left\|\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (31)

Taking total expectation for both sides of (31) yields

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22=ğ”¼â€‹[ğ”¼â„tâ€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„tâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22]ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptğ”¼subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}_{\mathcal{I}_{t}}\left\|\sum_{i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}\right]
=nNâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22+nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)N2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.absentğ‘›ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22ğ‘›ğ‘›1superscriptğ‘2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle=\frac{n}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{n(n-1)}{N^{2}}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (32)

Plugging (32) back into (30) gives

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆnIIDtâ€–22â‰¤4â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î·Â¯2nâ€‹Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡224ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ‘›ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}\leq 4K\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{2\bar{\eta}^{2}}{nN}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹Î·Â¯2nâ€‹N2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–222ğ‘›1superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ‘›superscriptğ‘2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\qquad+\frac{2(n-1)\bar{\eta}^{2}}{nN^{2}}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤4â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î·Â¯2nâ€‹Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ‘®it,kâ€–22absent4ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ‘›ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ¾ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\leq 4K\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{2\bar{\eta}^{2}}{nN}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}K\mathbb{E}\|\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹Î·Â¯2N2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–222superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ‘2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\qquad+\frac{2\bar{\eta}^{2}}{N^{2}}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤4â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹G2â€‹K2â€‹Î·Â¯2n+2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22,absent4ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ‘›2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\leq 4K\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{2G^{2}K^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}}{n}+2\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}, (33)

where the second inequality follows from Fact 2 with m=Kğ‘šğ¾m=K and the third inequality holds due to Assumption 6. This completes the proof. âˆ

Lemma 4.

Suppose that Assumptions 1, 2 3, and 5 hold. Then, it holds for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 that

1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰¤(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹K2â€‹Î·Â¯21ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¾2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}\leq(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2K^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+16â€‹K3â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+16â€‹L2â€‹K3Nâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22.16superscriptğ¾3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡2216superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾3ğ‘superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+16K^{3}\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{16L^{2}K^{3}}{N}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}.
Proof.

Using the local iteration formula, we have

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’Î·Â¯â€‹ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bar{\eta}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼âˆ¥ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’Î·Â¯(ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it+ğ‘®it\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\Big{\|}\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bar{\eta}\Big{(}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t}+\bm{G}_{i}^{t}
âˆ’âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)âˆ’âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t))\displaystyle\quad-\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\Big{)}
âˆ’Î·Â¯â€‹(ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1)âˆ¥22evaluated-atÂ¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜122\displaystyle\quad-\bar{\eta}\Big{(}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}\Big{)}\Big{\|}_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼âˆ¥ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’Î·Â¯(ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it+ğ‘®it\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\Big{\|}\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bar{\eta}\Big{(}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t}+\bm{G}_{i}^{t}
âˆ’âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)âˆ’âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t))âˆ¥22\displaystyle\quad-\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\Big{)}\Big{\|}_{2}^{2}
+Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1â€–22,superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜122\displaystyle\quad+\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}\|_{2}^{2}, (34)

where the last equality holds because Fact 1 and Assumption 2 imply that the cross term is 0, e.g.,

ğ”¼âŸ¨ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’Î·Â¯(ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it+ğ‘®itâˆ’âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\Big{\langle}\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bar{\eta}\left(\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t}+\bm{G}_{i}^{t}-\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})\right.
+âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)âˆ’âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)),ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âŸ©\displaystyle\quad\left.+\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\right),\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}\Big{\rangle}
=ğ”¼âŸ¨ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’Î·Â¯(ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it+ğ‘®itâˆ’âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\Big{\langle}\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bar{\eta}\left(\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t}+\bm{G}_{i}^{t}-\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})\right.
+âˆ‡Fi(ğ’˜t)âˆ’âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)),\displaystyle\qquad\left.+\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\right),
ğ”¼[ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1|ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1,ğ’˜t]âŸ©=0.\displaystyle\qquad\mathbb{E}\left[\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}\leavevmode\nobreak\ \middle|\leavevmode\nobreak\ \bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1},\bm{w}^{t}\right]\Big{\rangle}=0.

It follows that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(a)superscriptğ‘\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}} Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2+(1+12â€‹Kâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2112ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \bar{\eta}^{2}\sigma^{2}+\left(1+\frac{1}{2K-1}\right)\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼âˆ¥ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it+ğ‘®itâˆ’âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(ğ’˜t)conditional2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle+2K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t}+\bm{G}_{i}^{t}-\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})
âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âˆ¥22âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡evaluated-atâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(b)superscriptğ‘\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}} (1+12â€‹Kâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22112ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\left(1+\frac{1}{2K-1}\right)\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®itâ€–22+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ‘®itâˆ’âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–228ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡228ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{G}_{i}^{t}-\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}
+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–228ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F_{i}(\bm{w}^{t})-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}
+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ28ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\bar{\eta}^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(c)superscriptğ‘\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(c)}}{{\leq}} (1+12â€‹Kâˆ’1+8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22112ğ¾18superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\left(1+\frac{1}{2K-1}+8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
+8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Î½28superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡228ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœˆ2\displaystyle+8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\nu^{2}
+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ28ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\bar{\eta}^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(d)superscriptğ‘‘\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(d)}}{{\leq}} (1+1Kâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹Î·Â¯211ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle\left(1+\frac{1}{K-1}\right)\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})\bar{\eta}^{2}
+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22,8ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡228superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}, (35)

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses Assumption 3 and the fact that â€–ğ’™+ğ’šâ€–22â‰¤(1+1/Î²)â€‹â€–ğ’™â€–22+(1+Î²)â€‹â€–ğ’šâ€–22superscriptsubscriptnormğ’™ğ’š2211ğ›½superscriptsubscriptnormğ’™221ğ›½superscriptsubscriptnormğ’š22\|\bm{x}+\bm{y}\|_{2}^{2}\leq(1+1/\beta)\|\bm{x}\|_{2}^{2}+(1+\beta)\|\bm{y}\|_{2}^{2} for vectors ğ’™,ğ’šğ’™ğ’š\bm{x},\bm{y} and Î²=2â€‹Kâˆ’1ğ›½2ğ¾1\beta=2K-1, (b)ğ‘(b) uses Fact 2 with n=3ğ‘›3n=3, (c)ğ‘(c) is implied by Assumptions 1 and 5, and (d)ğ‘‘(d) holds because Î·Â¯â‰¤14â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ‡’1+12â€‹Kâˆ’1+8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â‰¤1+1Kâˆ’1.Â¯ğœ‚14ğ¿ğ¾â‡’112ğ¾18superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚211ğ¾1\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{1}{4LK}\Rightarrow 1+\frac{1}{2K-1}+8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}\leq 1+\frac{1}{K-1}. Let Zit,kâ‰”ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰”superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22Z_{i}^{t,k}\coloneqq\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}, aâ‰”1+1Kâˆ’1â‰”ğ‘11ğ¾1a\coloneqq 1+\frac{1}{K-1}, and bâ‰”(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹Î·Â¯2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22â‰”ğ‘superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚28ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡228superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22b\coloneqq(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})\bar{\eta}^{2}+8K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}, then (35) can be written as

Zit,kâ‰¤aâ€‹Zit,kâˆ’1+b.superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1ğ‘Z_{i}^{t,k}\leq aZ_{i}^{t,k-1}+b.

Solving this recursion gives

Zit,kâ‰¤akâ€‹Zit,0+bâ€‹âˆ‘â„“=0kâˆ’1aâ„“=akâˆ’1aâˆ’1â€‹bsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ‘ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘¡0ğ‘superscriptsubscriptâ„“0ğ‘˜1superscriptğ‘â„“superscriptğ‘ğ‘˜1ğ‘1ğ‘\displaystyle Z_{i}^{t,k}\leq a^{k}Z_{i}^{t,0}+b\sum_{\ell=0}^{k-1}a^{\ell}=\frac{a^{k}-1}{a-1}b
=(Kâˆ’1)â€‹((1+1Kâˆ’1)Kâˆ’1âˆ’1)â€‹bâ‰¤2â€‹(Kâˆ’1)â€‹b,absentğ¾1superscript11ğ¾1ğ¾11ğ‘2ğ¾1ğ‘\displaystyle=(K-1)\left(\left(1+\frac{1}{K-1}\right)^{K-1}-1\right)b\leq 2(K-1)b,

where the second inequality holds due to the fact that (1+1Kâˆ’1)Kâˆ’1â‰¤eâ‰¤3superscript11ğ¾1ğ¾1ğ‘’3\left(1+\frac{1}{K-1}\right)^{K-1}\leq e\leq 3 with eğ‘’e is being Eulerâ€™s number. This implies that

1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰¤1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’12â€‹(Kâˆ’1)â€‹b.1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡221ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾12ğ¾1ğ‘\displaystyle\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}\leq\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}2(K-1)b.

Substituting bğ‘b and simplifying gives the desired result. âˆ

Lemma 5.

Suppose that Assumptions 2, 3, and 4 hold. Then, it holds for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 and iâˆˆâ„tğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡i\in\mathcal{I}_{t} that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜tâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰¤4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»+2â€‹G2â€‹K2â€‹Î»2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡224superscriptğœ2ğ¾ğœ†2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğœ†2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{t}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}\leq\frac{4\sigma^{2}K{\lambda}+2G^{2}K^{2}{\lambda}^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+2â€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–22.2ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\qquad+2{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}.
Proof.

For each iâˆˆâ„tğ‘–subscriptâ„ğ‘¡i\in\mathcal{I}_{t}, we consider the following two cases: i) Ï„iâ€‹(t)=tsubscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡\tau_{i}(t)=t. Then, we have ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜tâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22=0ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡220\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{t}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}=0. ii) Ï„iâ€‹(t)<tsubscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡\tau_{i}(t)<t. In view of (4) and (6), the serverâ€™s global iteration in round sâˆˆ[Ï„iâ€‹(t),tâˆ’1]ğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1s\in[\tau_{i}(t),t-1] can be written as ğ’˜s+1=ğ’˜sâˆ’Î·|â„s|â€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sÎ·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ’ˆjs,k.superscriptğ’˜ğ‘ 1superscriptğ’˜ğ‘ ğœ‚subscriptâ„ğ‘ subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜\bm{w}^{s+1}=\bm{w}^{s}-\frac{\eta}{|\mathcal{I}_{s}|}\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\bar{\eta}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}. Then, we have

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜tâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22=ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1(ğ’˜s+1âˆ’ğ’˜s)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1superscriptğ’˜ğ‘ 1superscriptğ’˜ğ‘ 22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{t}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}(\bm{w}^{s+1}-\bm{w}^{s})\right\|_{2}^{2}
=ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1Î·nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ’ˆjs,kâ€–22absentğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1ğœ‚ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\frac{\eta}{n}\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1Î·nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹(ğ’ˆjs,kâˆ’ğ‘®js,k)â€–22absent2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1ğœ‚ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\leq 2\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\frac{\eta}{n}\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\left(\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1Î·nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ‘®js,kâ€–222ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1ğœ‚ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\quad+2\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\frac{\eta}{n}\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(a)2â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2n2â€‹2â€‹nâ€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Ïƒ2+2â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2n2â€‹|tâˆ’Ï„iâ€‹(t)|â€‹âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–22superscriptğ‘absent2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ‘›22ğ‘›ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ22superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ‘›2ğ‘¡subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}\frac{2\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}}{n^{2}}2nK{\lambda}\sigma^{2}+\frac{2\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}}{n^{2}}|t-\tau_{i}(t)|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(b)4â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2n2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆâ„sâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–22,superscriptğ‘absent4ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—subscriptâ„ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}}4K{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{2{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in\mathcal{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}, (36)

where (a)ğ‘(a) employs Lemma 2 and Fact 2 with m=|tâˆ’Ï„iâ€‹(t)|ğ‘šğ‘¡subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡m=|t-\tau_{i}(t)| and (b)ğ‘(b) is implied by Assumption 4. Substituting (32) with t=sğ‘¡ğ‘ t=s back into (36) gives

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜tâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{t}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 4â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î»nâ€‹Nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1âˆ‘j=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–224ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2ğœ†ğ‘›ğ‘superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle 4K{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{2{\lambda}}{nN}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹Î»n2â€‹N2â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–222ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœ†superscriptğ‘›2superscriptğ‘2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+\frac{2n(n-1){\lambda}}{n^{2}N^{2}}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 4â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î»nâ€‹Nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ‘®js,kâ€–224ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2ğœ†ğ‘›ğ‘superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ¾ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle 4K{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{2{\lambda}}{nN}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}K\mathbb{E}\|\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹Î»n2â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–222ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœ†superscriptğ‘›2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+\frac{2n(n-1){\lambda}}{n^{2}}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»+2â€‹G2â€‹K2â€‹Î»2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2+2â€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘j=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–22,4superscriptğœ2ğ¾ğœ†2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğœ†2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚22ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\frac{4\sigma^{2}K{\lambda}+2G^{2}K^{2}{\lambda}^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}+2{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{j=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2},

where the second inequality follows from Fact 2 with m=Kğ‘šğ¾m=K and the third inequality is due to Assumption 6. Combining cases i) and ii) completes the proof. âˆ

A.1.2 Putting Ingredients Together

Proof.

Using the descent lemma due to the Lğ¿L-smoothness by Assumption 1 and the update formula (6), we have

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t+1)]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t+1})]
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]+ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),ğ’˜t+1âˆ’ğ’˜tâŸ©+Lâ€‹Î·22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜t+1âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ¿superscriptğœ‚22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]+\mathbb{E}\langle\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\bm{w}^{t+1}-\bm{w}^{t}\rangle+\frac{L\eta^{2}}{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{t+1}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),Î·â€‹ğ’ˆnIIDtâŸ©+Lâ€‹Î·22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆnIIDtâ€–22ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡ğ¿superscriptğœ‚22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]-\mathbb{E}\langle\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\eta\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\rangle+\frac{L\eta^{2}}{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]+Lâ€‹Î·22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆnIIDtâ€–22ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ¿superscriptğœ‚22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]+\frac{L\eta^{2}}{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}
âˆ’Î·â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),ğ’ˆnIIDtâˆ’Kâ€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)+Kâ€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âŸ©ğœ‚ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡ğ¾Â¯ğœ‚âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ¾Â¯ğœ‚âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle-\eta\mathbb{E}\langle\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}-K\bar{\eta}\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+K\bar{\eta}\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\rangle
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]âˆ’Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]-K\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}
+Î·â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),Î·Â¯â€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âˆ’ğ’ˆnIIDtâŸ©+Lâ€‹Î·22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆnIIDtâ€–22.ğœ‚ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡Â¯ğœ‚ğ¾âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡ğ¿superscriptğœ‚22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆnIIDğ‘¡22\displaystyle+\eta\mathbb{E}\langle\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\bar{\eta}K\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})-\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\rangle+\frac{L\eta^{2}}{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{nIID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}. (37)

Substituting the last two term in the above inequality by employing Lemmas 1 and 3, we have

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t+1)]âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t+1})]-\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+L2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ¾2ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22superscriptğ¿2ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle-\frac{K}{2}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+L^{2}\eta\bar{\eta}\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+G2â€‹Lâ€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2+L2â€‹KNâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–222superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾superscriptğº2ğ¿superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğ‘ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+\frac{2\sigma^{2}LK+G^{2}LK^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}+\frac{L^{2}K}{N}\eta\bar{\eta}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}
âˆ’(12â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.12ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle-\left(\frac{1}{2K}\eta\bar{\eta}-L\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}.

Substituting 1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–221ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2} using Lemma 4, we have

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t+1)]âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t+1})]-\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’(K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’16â€‹L2â€‹K3â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22ğ¾2ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚16superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾3ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle-\left(\frac{K}{2}\eta\bar{\eta}-16L^{2}K^{3}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}\right)\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}
+2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+G2â€‹Lâ€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯32superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾superscriptğº2ğ¿superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3\displaystyle+\frac{2\sigma^{2}LK+G^{2}LK^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}
+(L2â€‹K+16â€‹L4â€‹K3Nâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯+16â€‹L4â€‹K3Nâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3)â€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22superscriptğ¿2ğ¾16superscriptğ¿4superscriptğ¾3ğ‘ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚16superscriptğ¿4superscriptğ¾3ğ‘ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+\left(\frac{L^{2}K+16L^{4}K^{3}}{N}\eta\bar{\eta}+\frac{16L^{4}K^{3}}{N}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}\right)\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}
âˆ’(12â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–2212ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle-\left(\frac{1}{2K}\eta\bar{\eta}-L\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+G2â€‹Lâ€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡222superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾superscriptğº2ğ¿superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{2\sigma^{2}LK+G^{2}LK^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3+2â€‹L2â€‹KNâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚32superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğ‘ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}+\frac{2L^{2}K}{N}\eta\bar{\eta}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}
âˆ’14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22,14ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle-\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}, (38)

where the last inequality holds because of condition (11):

Î·Â¯â‰¤18â€‹Lâ€‹KÂ¯ğœ‚18ğ¿ğ¾\displaystyle\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{1}{8LK} âŸºK2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’16â€‹L2â€‹K3â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3â‰¥K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯,âŸºabsentğ¾2ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚16superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾3ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚\displaystyle\Longleftrightarrow\frac{K}{2}\eta\bar{\eta}-16L^{2}K^{3}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}\geq\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta},
Î·Â¯â‰¤14â€‹Lâ€‹KÂ¯ğœ‚14ğ¿ğ¾\displaystyle\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{1}{4LK} âŸºL2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯+16â€‹L4â€‹K3â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3â‰¤2â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯,âŸºabsentsuperscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚16superscriptğ¿4superscriptğ¾3ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚32superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚\displaystyle\Longleftrightarrow L^{2}K\eta\bar{\eta}+16L^{4}K^{3}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}\leq 2L^{2}K\eta\bar{\eta},
Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â‰¤12â€‹Lâ€‹Kğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚12ğ¿ğ¾\displaystyle\eta\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{1}{2LK} âŸº12â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â‰¥14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯.âŸºabsent12ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚214ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚\displaystyle\Longleftrightarrow\frac{1}{2K}\eta\bar{\eta}-L\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\geq\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}.

Substituting 1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–221ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2} in (38) using Lemma 5, we obtain

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t+1)]âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t+1})]-\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡222superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{2\sigma^{2}LK+LG^{2}K^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3+8â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î»+4â€‹L2â€‹G2â€‹K3â€‹Î»2nâ€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚38superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ†4superscriptğ¿2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾3superscriptğœ†2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3\displaystyle+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}+\frac{8\sigma^{2}L^{2}K^{2}{\lambda}+4L^{2}G^{2}K^{3}{\lambda}^{2}}{n}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}
âˆ’14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–2214ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle-\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
+4â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®is,kâ€–224superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+4L^{2}K{\lambda}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+2â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡224superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾2ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{4\sigma^{2}LK+2LG^{2}K^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3âˆ’14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚314ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}-\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
+4â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®is,kâ€–22,4superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+4L^{2}K{\lambda}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}, (39)

where the second inequality holds by using condition (11):

Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â‰¤2â€‹Ïƒ2+G2â€‹K8â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹Î»+4â€‹G2â€‹Lâ€‹K2â€‹Î»2ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2superscriptğº2ğ¾8superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾ğœ†4superscriptğº2ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğœ†2\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \eta\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{2\sigma^{2}+G^{2}K}{8\sigma^{2}LK\lambda+4G^{2}LK^{2}\lambda^{2}}
â‡”â‡”\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow 2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2+8â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î»+4â€‹L2â€‹G2â€‹K3â€‹Î»2nâ€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯32superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚28superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ†4superscriptğ¿2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾3superscriptğœ†2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \frac{2\sigma^{2}LK+LG^{2}K^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}+\frac{8\sigma^{2}L^{2}K^{2}\lambda+4L^{2}G^{2}K^{3}{\lambda}^{2}}{n}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}
â‰¤4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹K+2â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2nâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2.absent4superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾2ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \leq\frac{4\sigma^{2}LK+2LG^{2}K^{2}}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}. (40)

By summing inequality (39) over t=0,1,â€¦,Tâˆ’1ğ‘¡01â€¦ğ‘‡1t=0,1,\dots,T-1, we obtain

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜T)]âˆ’Fâ€‹[ğ’˜0]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘‡ğ¹delimited-[]superscriptğ’˜0\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{T})]-F[\bm{w}^{0}]
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T+2â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2â€‹Tnâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡224superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡2ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘‡ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{4\sigma^{2}LKT+2LG^{2}K^{2}T}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Tâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3âˆ’14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘‡ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚314ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}T\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}-\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
+4â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®is,kâ€–22âŸYs4superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1subscriptâŸğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘ ğ‘˜22superscriptğ‘Œğ‘ \displaystyle+4L^{2}K{\lambda}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\underbrace{\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}}_{Y^{s}}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T+2â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2â€‹Tnâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡224superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡2ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘‡ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{4\sigma^{2}LKT+2LG^{2}K^{2}T}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Tâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘‡ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3\displaystyle+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}T\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}
âˆ’(14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’4â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»2â€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3)â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Nâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22,14ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚4superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptğœ†2superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle-\left(\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}-4L^{2}K{\lambda}^{2}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}\right)\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2},
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T+2â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹K2â€‹Tnâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡224superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡2ğ¿superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘‡ğ‘›superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{4\sigma^{2}LKT+2LG^{2}K^{2}T}{n}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}
+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Tâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3,superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ22superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğ‘‡ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3\displaystyle+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})2L^{2}K^{2}T\eta\bar{\eta}^{3},

where the second inequality uses the fact that âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1Ysâ‰¤âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’2Î»â€‹Ytâ‰¤Î»â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1Ytsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1superscriptğ‘Œğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡2ğœ†superscriptğ‘Œğ‘¡ğœ†superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1superscriptğ‘Œğ‘¡\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}Y^{s}\leq\sum_{t=0}^{T-2}{\lambda}Y^{t}\leq{\lambda}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}Y^{t} and the last inequality holds because of condition (13):

Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â‰¤14â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹Î»âŸº14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯âˆ’4â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»2â€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3â‰¥0.âŸºğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚14ğ¿ğ¾ğœ†14ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚4superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptğœ†2superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚30\eta\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{1}{4LK{\lambda}}\Longleftrightarrow\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}-4L^{2}K{\lambda}^{2}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}\geq 0.

Rearranging and using the fact that Fâˆ—â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜T)]superscriptğ¹ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘‡F^{*}\leq\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{T})], we have

1Tâ€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–221ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= 4â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ’˜0)âˆ’Fâˆ—)Kâ€‹Tâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯+16â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹L+8â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹Knâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯24ğ¹superscriptğ’˜0superscriptğ¹ğ¾ğ‘‡ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚16superscriptğœ2ğ¿8ğ¿superscriptğº2ğ¾ğ‘›ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ28superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2\displaystyle\frac{4(F(\bm{w}^{0})-F^{*})}{KT\eta\bar{\eta}}+\frac{16\sigma^{2}L+8LG^{2}K}{n}\eta\bar{\eta}+(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}
=\displaystyle= 256â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ’˜0)âˆ’Fâˆ—)â€‹(16â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹L+8â€‹Lâ€‹G2â€‹K)nâ€‹Kâ€‹T+(Ïƒ2+8â€‹Kâ€‹Î½2)â€‹8â€‹L2(4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹L+2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹G2)â€‹Kâ€‹T,256ğ¹superscriptğ’˜0superscriptğ¹16superscriptğœ2ğ¿8ğ¿superscriptğº2ğ¾ğ‘›ğ¾ğ‘‡superscriptğœ28ğ¾superscriptğœˆ28superscriptğ¿24superscriptğœ2ğ¿2ğ¿ğ¾superscriptğº2ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle\sqrt{\frac{256(F(\bm{w}^{0})-F^{*})(16\sigma^{2}L+8LG^{2}K)}{nKT}}+\frac{(\sigma^{2}+8K\nu^{2})8L^{2}}{(4\sigma^{2}L+2LKG^{2})KT}, (41)

where the second equality follows by substituting Î·=4â€‹nâ€‹Kâ€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ’˜0)âˆ’Fâˆ—)ğœ‚4ğ‘›ğ¾ğ¹superscriptğ’˜0superscriptğ¹\eta=\sqrt{4nK(F(\bm{w}^{0})-F^{*})} and Î·Â¯=1/(4â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹L+2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹G2)â€‹Tâ€‹KÂ¯ğœ‚14superscriptğœ2ğ¿2ğ¿ğ¾superscriptğº2ğ‘‡ğ¾\bar{\eta}=1/\sqrt{(4\sigma^{2}L+2LKG^{2})T}K. This completes the proof of Theorem 1. âˆ

A.2 Proof of Theorem 2

A.2.1 Technical Lemmas

Lemma 6.

Suppose that Assumptions 1 and 2 hold. Then, it hold for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 that

ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),Î·Â¯â€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âˆ’ğ’ˆIIDtâŸ©ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡Â¯ğœ‚ğ¾âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆIIDğ‘¡\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \mathbb{E}\langle\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\bar{\eta}K\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})-\bm{g}_{\textnormal{IID}}^{t}\rangle
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq K2â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+L2nâ€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ¾2Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22superscriptğ¿2ğ‘›Â¯ğœ‚subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\leavevmode\nobreak\ \frac{K}{2}\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{L^{2}}{n}\bar{\eta}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
+L2â€‹Knâ€‹Î·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22âˆ’12â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğ‘›Â¯ğœ‚subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡2212ğ¾Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+\frac{L^{2}K}{n}\bar{\eta}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}-\frac{1}{2K}\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}.
Proof.

Using the local iteration formula of DeFedAvg-IID, we have ğš«it=ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),0âˆ’ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),K=âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ’ˆit,ksuperscriptsubscriptğš«ğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡0superscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ¾superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜\bm{\Delta}_{i}^{t}=\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),0}-\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),K}=\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}, which implies that

ğ’ˆIIDtâ‰”1|It|â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItğš«it=Î·Â¯nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ’ˆit,k.â‰”superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆIIDğ‘¡1subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğš«ğ‘–ğ‘¡Â¯ğœ‚ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜\displaystyle\bm{g}_{\textnormal{IID}}^{t}\coloneqq\frac{1}{|I_{t}|}\sum_{i\in I_{t}}\bm{\Delta}_{i}^{t}=\frac{\bar{\eta}}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}. (42)

Therefore, we have

ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),Î·Â¯â€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âˆ’ğ’ˆIIDtâŸ©ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡Â¯ğœ‚ğ¾âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆIIDğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\langle\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\bar{\eta}K\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})-\bm{g}_{\textnormal{IID}}^{t}\rangle
=\displaystyle= Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨Kâ€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t),1Kâ€‹nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆIt(Kâ€‹âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)âˆ’âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ’ˆit,k)âŸ©.Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼ğ¾âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1ğ¾ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡ğ¾âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜\displaystyle\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\left\langle\sqrt{K}\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t}),\frac{1}{\sqrt{K}n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\left(K\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})-\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}\right)\right\rangle.

The remaining can be proved using similar arguments as the proof of Lemma 1, which is omitted for brevity. âˆ

Lemma 7.

Suppose that Assumptions 2, 3, and 4 hold. Then, it holds for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2} â‰¤nâ€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2,absentğ‘›ğ¾superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\leq nK\sigma^{2}, (43)

Besides, it holds for all tâ‰¥1ğ‘¡1t\geq 1 and iâˆˆItğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡i\in{I}_{t} that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1âˆ‘jâˆˆIsâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆjs,kâˆ’ğ‘®js,k)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\sum_{j\in{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2} â‰¤nâ€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Ïƒ2.absentğ‘›ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\leq nK{\lambda}\sigma^{2}. (44)
Proof.

The proof is similar to that of Lemma 2, while there is no randomness in Itsubscriptğ¼ğ‘¡I_{t}. Following analogous arguments in the proof of Lemma 2, we can obtain

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k)â€–22=âˆ‘jâˆˆItğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,k)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22subscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}=\sum_{j\in{I}_{t}}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}
=âˆ‘jâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆjt,kâˆ’ğ‘®jt,kâ€–22â‰¤nâ€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2,absentsubscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22ğ‘›ğ¾superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\sum_{j\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\bm{g}_{j}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq nK\sigma^{2},

and thus

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1âˆ‘jâˆˆIsâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆjs,kâˆ’ğ‘®js,k)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\sum_{j\in{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}
=âˆ‘s=Ï„iâ€‹(t)tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆIsâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1(ğ’ˆjs,kâˆ’ğ‘®js,k)â€–22â‰¤âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1nâ€‹Kâ€‹Ïƒ2â‰¤nâ€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Ïƒ2,absentsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ‘›ğ¾superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\sum_{s=\tau_{i}(t)}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\left(\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k}-\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}nK\sigma^{2}\leq nK{\lambda}\sigma^{2},

which complete the proof. âˆ

Lemma 8.

Suppose that Assumptions 2, 3, and 4 hold. Then, it hold for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆIIDtâ€–22â‰¤2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆIIDğ‘¡222ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{IID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}\leq 2K\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+2\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (45)
Proof.

In view of (42), we have

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’ˆIIDtâ€–22=ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ’ˆit,kâ€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’ˆIIDğ‘¡22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{\textnormal{IID}}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(a)2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹(ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’ğ‘®it,k)â€–22+2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1Î·Â¯â€‹ğ‘®it,kâ€–22superscriptğ‘absent2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜222ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}2\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\left(\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right)\right\|_{2}^{2}+2\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bar{\eta}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
â‰¤(b)2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–22.superscriptğ‘absent2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}}2K\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+2\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (46)

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses Fact 2 with m=2ğ‘š2m=2, (b)ğ‘(b) follows from (43). âˆ

Lemma 9.

Suppose that Assumption 1, 2, and 3 hold and Î·Â¯â‰¤12â€‹2â€‹Lâ€‹KÂ¯ğœ‚122ğ¿ğ¾\bar{\eta}\leq\frac{1}{2\sqrt{2}LK}. Then, it holds for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 that

1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰¤2â€‹K2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ21ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡222superscriptğ¾2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}\leq 2K^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sigma^{2}
+12â€‹K3â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+12â€‹L2â€‹K3nâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’ğ’˜tâ€–22.12superscriptğ¾3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡2212superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾3ğ‘›superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle+12K^{3}\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{12L^{2}K^{3}}{n}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bm{w}^{t}\|_{2}^{2}.
Proof.

The proof is similar to that of Lemma 4. We simply need to change (34) and (35) as

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼âˆ¥ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)âˆ’Î·Â¯(ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ’âˆ‡F(ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t))+âˆ‡F(ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t))\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\Big{\|}\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}-\bar{\eta}\Big{(}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)})
âˆ’âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t)+âˆ‡F(ğ’˜t))âˆ¥22+Î·Â¯2ğ”¼âˆ¥ğ’ˆit,kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ‘®it,kâˆ’1âˆ¥22\displaystyle-\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})+\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\Big{)}\Big{\|}_{2}^{2}+\bar{\eta}^{2}\mathbb{E}\|\bm{g}_{i}^{t,k-1}-\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k-1}\|_{2}^{2}

and

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰¤(1+1Kâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜iÏ„iâ€‹(t),kâˆ’1âˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡2211ğ¾1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’˜ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜1superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{K-1}\right)\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}_{i}^{\tau_{i}(t),k-1}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}

respectively. The remaining proof is omitted for brevity. âˆ

Lemma 10.

Suppose that Assumptions 2, 3, and 4 hold. Then, it holds for all tâ‰¥0ğ‘¡0t\geq 0 and iâˆˆItğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡i\in{I}_{t} that

ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ’˜tâˆ’ğ’˜Ï„iâ€‹(t)â€–22â‰¤2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2nğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡superscriptğ’˜subscriptğœğ‘–ğ‘¡222ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\bm{w}^{t}-\bm{w}^{\tau_{i}(t)}\|_{2}^{2}\leq 2K{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}
+2â€‹Î»â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆIsâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®js,kâ€–22.2ğœ†superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle+2{\lambda}\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{j}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}.
Proof.

The proof is a simple adjustment of (36) by employing ğ’˜s+1=ğ’˜sâˆ’Î·|Is|â€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆIsÎ·Â¯â€‹âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ’ˆjs,ksuperscriptğ’˜ğ‘ 1superscriptğ’˜ğ‘ ğœ‚subscriptğ¼ğ‘ subscriptğ‘—subscriptğ¼ğ‘ Â¯ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘—ğ‘ ğ‘˜\bm{w}^{s+1}=\bm{w}^{s}-\frac{\eta}{|I_{s}|}\sum_{j\in I_{s}}\bar{\eta}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{g}_{j}^{s,k} and Lemma 7. The details are omitted for brevity. âˆ

A.2.2 Putting Ingredients Together

Proof.
ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t+1)]âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)]â‰¤âˆ’K4â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–22+2â€‹Lâ€‹Kâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2nğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡1ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡ğ¾4ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡222ğ¿ğ¾superscriptğœ‚2superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t+1})]-\mathbb{E}[F(\bm{w}^{t})]\leq-\frac{K}{4}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2}+2LK\eta^{2}\bar{\eta}^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}
+2â€‹L2â€‹K2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯3â€‹Ïƒ2âˆ’14â€‹Kâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆItâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®it,kâ€–222superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¾2ğœ‚superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptğœ214ğ¾ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\quad+2L^{2}K^{2}\eta\bar{\eta}^{3}\sigma^{2}-\frac{1}{4K}\eta\bar{\eta}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{t}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{t,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}
+4â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î»â€‹Î·3â€‹Î·Â¯3â€‹âˆ‘s=(tâˆ’Î»)+tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆIsâˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1ğ‘®is,kâ€–22,4superscriptğ¿2ğ¾ğœ†superscriptğœ‚3superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚3superscriptsubscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘¡ğœ†ğ‘¡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ¼ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘®ğ‘–ğ‘ ğ‘˜22\displaystyle\quad+4L^{2}K{\lambda}\eta^{3}\bar{\eta}^{3}\sum_{s=(t-{\lambda})_{+}}^{t-1}\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in{I}_{s}}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\bm{G}_{i}^{s,k}\right\|_{2}^{2}, (47)

Further using similar arguments for proving (41) and the learning rate conditions (13), we have

1Tâ€‹âˆ‘t=0Tâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ’˜t)â€–221ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡1ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ’˜ğ‘¡22\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=0}^{T-1}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla F(\bm{w}^{t})\|_{2}^{2} =4â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ’˜0)âˆ’Fâˆ—)Kâ€‹Tâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯+8â€‹Lâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Â¯â€‹Ïƒ2n+8â€‹L2â€‹Kâ€‹Î·Â¯2â€‹Ïƒ2absent4ğ¹superscriptğ’˜0superscriptğ¹ğ¾ğ‘‡ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚8ğ¿ğœ‚Â¯ğœ‚superscriptğœ2ğ‘›8superscriptğ¿2ğ¾superscriptÂ¯ğœ‚2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\frac{4(F(\bm{w}^{0})-F^{*})}{KT\eta\bar{\eta}}+8L\eta\bar{\eta}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+8L^{2}K\bar{\eta}^{2}\sigma^{2}
=128â€‹Lâ€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ’˜0)âˆ’Fâˆ—)nâ€‹Kâ€‹T+8â€‹LKâ€‹T,absent128ğ¿ğ¹superscriptğ’˜0superscriptğ¹ğ‘›ğ¾ğ‘‡8ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle=\sqrt{\frac{128L(F(\bm{w}^{0})-F^{*})}{nKT}}+\frac{8L}{KT},

where the second equality holds since Î·=(Fâ€‹(ğ’˜0)âˆ’Fâˆ—)â€‹nâ€‹K/2ğœ‚ğ¹superscriptğ’˜0superscriptğ¹ğ‘›ğ¾2\eta=\sqrt{(F(\bm{w}^{0})-F^{*})nK/2} and Î·Â¯=1/(Ïƒ2â€‹Lâ€‹Tâ€‹K)Â¯ğœ‚1superscriptğœ2ğ¿ğ‘‡ğ¾\bar{\eta}=1/(\sqrt{\sigma^{2}LT}K). This completes the proof of Theorem 2. âˆ

Appendix B Values of Global and Local Learning Rates

We provide the best-tuned values of the global and local learning rates used in our experiments, as shown in Table II.
